website_summaries.verdict: Works well for a variety of types of hunting. Great performance when shooting over varying distances.
pros: Design eliminates concerns about holdover when shooting at different distances
cons: Image may lose sharpness when shooting while making use of magnifications

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scope! I have always outfitted my rifles with ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Scope! I have always outfitted my rifles with Leupold VX-2 scopes until I tried one of these on a Ruger Hawkeye 30-06. I believe the Vortex is superior to the Leupold and it costs less. My wife, son and myself harvested several deer using this scope this year. I even had a sling break causing the rifle to fall off my shoulder and onto the gravel road I was walking on. The scope hit hard enough it suffered some scratches but was still dead on! You can’t go go wrong with this scope.
customer_reviews.author: Newbold

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one im having to send back
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd vortex scope I had to send back in a row. 1st one had black piece of plastic or metal on the inside lens of eye piece which was visible when looking thru it. 2nd one was scratched on objective lens and looked used. I'll order one more time, hopefully 3rd one is correct. Different sellers on each one. I have 2 other vortex vipers scopes and a pair of razor HD binos with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a leupold Mark AR with this, and could not be happier. Good clear glass. The reticle is great. Nice audible clicks and the turrets reset under the caps. This is best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Barrera Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scope!
customer_reviews.text: I zeroed the scope last week and was on point at hitting my half-inch target. The eye relief is excellent and the overall quality of the product is top notch. I moved to 200 yds and was able to hit my target 18 out of 20 times. That shouldn't take away from the scope though. I was in a rush and was shooting fast. I zoomed out to 12x and the view was still crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Min Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bought for ruger 10/22. Scope is very bright and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ruger 10/22. Scope is very bright and clear. Problem is the crosshairs get fuzzy on any setting above 5power. Even with the adjustable in and out couldn't get crosshairs to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This scope exceeded my expectations in more ways than one. First off, the clarity and range of the scope matches scopes that cost twice as much. I had low-to-fair expectations in terms of accuracy... It's held zero on my AR10 for over 400 rounds. I love that the zoom has a thumb-friendly throw... no need to add weird zip-tie configurations to make it cold-weather and glove friendly. Adjusting the sights is a breeze, with assertive clicks as you adjust the crosshairs, with each click equalling about 1/4 MOA. Clicks are not soft or mushy feeling, at all. I highly recommend this scope.... it's on par with my old Leupold.
customer_reviews.author: Warren G

customer_reviews.title: solid and practical scope with money left over for ammo...
customer_reviews.text: My first scope with magnification... Very solid, reasonably simple and no frills. Holds zero well, and though I've never had to make use of it, I love the warranty Vortex carries. If you're not familiar, look it up. I have this scope mounted on my AR-15 build in 6.5 Grendel, and have been able to reliably hit a target out to 750 yards (although being zeroed at 100 yards, the bullet drop does go somewhat lower than the hash marks...)
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Ive heard tons of great stuff about Vortex so decided to try the Kool-Aid. Optics are clear, and Vortex definitely makes quality optics but the eye relief on the Diamondback is horrible. Mine is mounted on an AR, so the recoil makes the eye relief tolerable, but a friend has one on a 30-06, and hes been scope eyed several times in the last two years.
customer_reviews.author: J.O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scope!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scope! Super clear, bright, and well made. I would recommend this scope to anyone as I have compared and looked through many other more expensive brands that are no better. I would also recommend that you buy Scope covers (say Butler Creek, or...) as the ones supplied with the scope are not that great and seem too fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Shred

customer_reviews.title: Better choices available...
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was relatively fast and was properly packaged. The scope itself was a let down. It is not as clear and defined as the comparable Leupold or Burris which was disappointing after all the hype about Vortex quality. I'm guessing their top end scopes are better, but there are considerably better choices for the same amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great optics
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this scope on a Remington 7mm-08. I love how much light this scope allows in. I am literally getting to sit 30 minutes long in my stand because of visibility now versus the Weaver scope I replaced. The reticles are great. I just took my rifle out again this week to check the scope before season and it was still set perfectly. I am buying another one for a rifle I am getting my wife for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: High Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 4-12x40 for my new Thompson-Center Compass in .308. I mounted it with standard steel scope rings and got it zeroed in just a few rounds. Combined with the Compass, I was able to shoot smaller than one inch groups at 100 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Epps

customer_reviews.title: Don't put this on anything that kicks, eye relief ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't put this on anything that kicks, eye relief is on the low end. I put this on a deer rifle and every time I shoot, it grazed my eyebrow. I took it off and went with more eye relief.
customer_reviews.author: mike n.

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was a fake. It was open when it arrived and very blurry, unable to see anything through it. I called vortex and found out it was a cheap knockoff because there wasn’t a serial number. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Michael cass

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scope for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great scope from a company with a great reputation. I mounted to my AR-10 rifle. Adjustable field of vision, easy to use and significant clarity even at the strongest setting. Easy windage and elevation adjustments. Awesome scope for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of problems!
customer_reviews.text: This scope has been a nightmare. Had it installed with the proper rings for my Tikka t3x from my local gun store. I went to bore site it but noticed the elevation screw you would remove to set zero was stuck so tight I couldn’t remove it. Took it back to the gun store where they were able to remove it and put it finger tight. Got home and noticed the windage turret is turning but not actually adjusting the focal point. F this scope!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Foster

customer_reviews.title: Eye Relief
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a well enough made scope, but made in the Phillipines. Only issue I had was the eye relief was too short for my liking. Returned and bought a Refield.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: Glass is really bad
customer_reviews.text: The glass is not good on this scope. Once you get to 10x, it gets very cloudy and eye relief sucks. I spent another $60 and got the Athlon Argos, and it’s hands down better in every way for very little extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is hard to beat. Having a 3.5x bottom end really opens up the field of view and a 50mm objective allows a lot of light to come in for those early morning/late night hunting sessions. My only complaint is the eye relief, too short and doesn’t allow for any head movement. Only took off 1 star because for the price idk that it can be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: WOW. This thing is great. I Went and looked at it at Bass pro ($220+ tax there) before finding it here for much less. What a great scope. Crisp and clear! Vortex really got it right with this one. I'm going to buy another to put on my other rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: Vortex scope
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! It looks as if it was repackaged from a consumer who sent it back. Scope cover is damaged (lens broken). I'm now wondering if the scope itself is damaged as well. The only reason I gave 5 stars for Accuracy and Sheerness is due to the Vortex name. Not at all happy with this transaction!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's a great scope for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a great scope for the money. The glass is clear and I can identify the reticle very fast. I did have one issue; however, it may not be the scope. My 308 was shooting very high when trying to sight the scope in. My friend and I had the turret bottomed out and I still had to aim around 2-3ft low at 50 yards to hit the target. I have a one piece mount with no adjustments so it could be that. I'll have to place a shim under the mount in order to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. Cant believe the difference between this scope and my old 3-9x40 (came stock on my 30-06). I have only heard good things about Vortex and they have a new customer for life. Plus you cant beat their warranty... 100% recommend to anyone who hunts any sort of large game. Side note: I had to buy the Large vortex hunting rifle scope rings. The mediums were just barley to short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scope for the money
customer_reviews.text: I paid $191 in 2015 to put on a Ruger American.270 and I'm still happy with it. I believe it retails $300+. FYI the BDC reticle only goes to 450 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is top notch for this price point but the eye relief on this model is absolutely terrible. Scope must be mounted with the eyepiece BEHIND the charging handle in order to see through it. This makes charging the rifle very difficult with the scope attached.
customer_reviews.author: JustAguy

customer_reviews.title: It was a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this scope when you dial it to 10 you have to move the eye piece so things come in clear but if something is closer and you dial it to 5 you have to dial the eyepiece again for it to come in clear I would like it clear regardless if I dial it to 10 or to 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scope for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Vortex scope in the past 8 months. This is a great middle of the road scope and serves it purpose very well. This one went on my grandsons .243. The clarity is very good. Holds a zero just as well. Would not hesitate to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bibby

customer_reviews.title: This scope is the best deal on low end scopes
customer_reviews.text: This scope is the best deal on low end scopes. Crystal clear glass.. Accurate 1/4 MOA on hundred yards.. Unlimited warranty is the bomb..Just grab one and u can tell the build is great. Made in Philippines but US quality scope..Make sure to buy 1 inch ring scope mount
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great hunting scope in this price range
customer_reviews.text: Great hunting scope in this price range, it's quality exceeds any others I have used in this price range (and I think I've tried them all at one time or another) Excellent Warranty policy, but I haven't had to use it yet. I have 6 of this particular model and NO complaints
customer_reviews.author: PD Sniper

customer_reviews.title: Found a case
customer_reviews.text: For anyone looking for a case, this is a perfect fit: Hermitshell Hard Travel Case Fits Vupoint Solutions Magic Wand Portable Scanner with Color LCD Display and Auto-Feed Dock (PDSDK-ST470-VP)
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to a point - less so above 9x
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with the full image staying clear from 9 - 12 power. The center stayed clear, but increasingly smaller as I dailed it up to 12. From 4-9 it is great. The eye relief is a bit fussy as well; I found a Leupold 3-9 to be more forgiving if you don't get your eye to the exact distance from the scope. You can be VERY happy with this scope. I could have been a bit happier.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: black ring of death
customer_reviews.text: hate it. hate it. hate it. hate it, the eye relief is like 3 inches, why the hell is the eye relief 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope for the all around deer hunter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scope for the money, works well for an all around deer hunter, as far as competitive I wouldn’t use this as my first choice. The warranty with Vortex can not be beat. The 50 mm lens makes a huge difference in the amount of light the scope lets in especially at dusk when you need it. Will continue to use on 270 WSM, this scope can also handle the recoil, but a good set of scope rings is key to insuring that the scope remains zeroed in. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Denton

customer_reviews.title: but the best thing I can say about it so far is ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat these scopes for the price. I've added this to a couple of rifles after using a set of diamondback binoculars while hunting whitetails in Michigan for a couple of years. I have nicer scopes, but they cost 3x+ as this and in hunting conditions they don't delivery anything this scope can out to practical shooting distances. The Vortex warranty is highly touted, but the best thing I can say about it so far is that I haven't needed to test it as I haven't had any problems with their products that would require repair.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H.

customer_reviews.title: This Vortex Diamondback is so good that I'm convinced that spending more money on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cheapskate so I've previously never spent more than a $100 on a rifle or pistol scope. This Vortex Diamondback is so good that I'm convinced that spending more money on a quality scope is worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fife

customer_reviews.title: large field of view
customer_reviews.text: the 1.75 magnification allows you to really see a target quickly as the entire eye piece seems to open up. perfect for 3 gun and close shooting. then turn it up to 5 and now you can shoot further. I previously was using a 4 x 9 and once i saw how much better this scope was at quickly acquiring a target i had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Glass
customer_reviews.text: A great as any Vortex product. Clear glass. Great lowlight visabliltiy, almost like not looking through glass at all. I will never buy anything but Vortex.
customer_reviews.author: JBrookie

customer_reviews.title: It's a vortex!
customer_reviews.text: Better than bushnell 3-9 side by side. Probably there is better vortex scopes out there but this one is good enough for my budget hunting deer in hill country.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Try to check the companies return policy for broken parts.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scope so far. I have not placed it on the rifle and sighted the scope in. The front cover lens is missing. There was broken lens in the box. To much trouble to send it back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Andrews

customer_reviews.title: oustanding
customer_reviews.text: By far the best scope and customer support out there. I will be a vortex customer for life after using their warranty once.
customer_reviews.author: Braxton

customer_reviews.title: love this scope
customer_reviews.text: love this scope, did a ton of research before buying, mounted on a ptr 91 gi, no problems and has held up well, also got size 5 and 6 flip up caps
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Very, very short mounting tube. Couldn't get the eye relief correct on a Ruger m77 30.06.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting area on this scope is REALLY short. I mounted it on a 30.06 Ruger M77. I couldn't get the eye relief to a point where it was useable for quick shouldering. Luckily, I have other equipment I can use it on, but I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ADV Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again and again and again.....
customer_reviews.text: first time buying anything vortex and I will say I will buy more. Clarity on this optic is by far the best I’ve seen. I sighted in a week ago and after trekking into the woods banging off tree limbs the optic stayed true.
customer_reviews.author: NC Geek

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that hasn't been said about Vortex. The company is outstanding, they really do an amazing job taking care of their customers and put out some of the best scopes available. This scope is definitely on par with other scopes at twice the price. It's super clear, easy to use and it has a solid build.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with the optic
customer_reviews.text: Since i researched riddle optics before I bought the diamondback, I'm very satisfied with the optic. The reticle is the right thickness for precision shots out to my expected range of 600-800 yards. Optics are clear, and brought enough for my use.
customer_reviews.author: pda0211

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!!
customer_reviews.text: Liked this scope for my 243. Good for the money. Had to break off the perminate site so it fit. The scope covers came in VERY handy during a hard rain on a hunt, but you don’t want to shoot through them unless it’s a quick draw. I will upgrade to quick flips
customer_reviews.author: JAKE HOBBS

customer_reviews.title: Great optics - gooe din for Vortex value vs price/quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite a Leopold but well worth the price for my 45-70. Seller is great also and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Had troubles getting sighted in. Noticed the factory had put the horizontal turret knob on top and the vertical turret knob on the side of the scope. Still had trouble sighting in. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Schwartzenburg

customer_reviews.title: Only about 200 rounds of 308 thru the rifle with it but still proving good. We shall see down the road
customer_reviews.text: I don't do many reviews but, I have to do this one. This scope has met my expectations upon the reviews I have read. Only about 200 rounds of 308 thru the rifle with it but still proving good. We shall see down the road. The clarity is as good as others are saying I suppose. But my one minor complaint is that at magnification 12, it becomes a little blurry.....hey my eyes are done with iron sights too, as I am almost 60 years old. You can say in a phrase, I am a Vortex fan!
customer_reviews.author: Invader1956

customer_reviews.title: Short eye relief but clear optics.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, sighted in quickly and held zero since. Eye relief is shorter then I prefer, may switch this over to AR and get something with 4" so it's not at the end of scope rings.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time hog hunt in the moonlight
customer_reviews.text: Went out for a late night hog hunt and this scope did a heck of a job in the moonlight. I could see just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Cronkhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scope. I use it with my SIG Sauer 516. I am impressed, especially considering the money.
customer_reviews.author: Detlef Alle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Good Rifle Scope
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Good Rifle Scope!!!! I have it on a Ruger 22Mag and have used it in many day-time conditions and it performed extremely well. I believe it's 2X better than the Nikon that I used to have on the Gun. For the Cost and Price Point.....Vortex is my First Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fields

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a rock solid ind mount on my mosin nagant. I used the low profile rings from vortex as well. Amazing picture and includes instructions to help understand moa.
customer_reviews.author: Erebus427

customer_reviews.title: It's a great addition to my 6.5 creedmoor!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great scope. Out of the box and to the range. It needed zero dialing in. I had issues with the bikini cover being cracked. I sent an email and I was promptly responded to within the time frame giving. I received a replacement shortly after. Costumer service is priority on my list. I would've returned the whole order with not so good customer service. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe J. Viera

customer_reviews.title: A good budget scope,
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it on my Interarms Mark X 30/06 over the weekend. Have not fired the gun with this scope yet, but I can say that the scope is very clear at all magnifications. I would like a little better eye relief, especially when you dial up to higher magnifications. A good upgrade over the old Tasco that was on the rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I’m extremely hard to accept bad material for guns and the Vortex always been my ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely hard to accept bad material for guns and the Vortex always been my favorite! Ones again perfect scope for 500 to 1000 yards for my 308 Ruger
customer_reviews.author: Kleverson A Villas

customer_reviews.title: Nice optic!
customer_reviews.text: Super clear sight picture! Haven’t had a chance to mount it to my 6.5 Grendel but I’ll update my review when I have a chance to test it for its ability to hold zero
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Spend more on a better scope.
customer_reviews.text: Elevation is only 5 total turns. Couldn't bore sight it. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Angel

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The scope want sight in when you turn the up and down knob it also moves to the right and left also..
customer_reviews.author: Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, holds zero, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a short time, but am very pleased. It has great clarity, holds zero, and I know I can depend on Vortex' lifetime warranty. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Dinwiddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this scope about a year ago, it is of excellent quality. the glass is clear, it has a tough housing, windage and elevation knobs are smooth and crisp when adjusting. I haven't had a problem with it holding zero. it is mounted on a .22lr(savage) bolt action. I can knock a sparrow off of a powerline with this setup at 100 yards. not too shabby.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good starter scope however I am a little bias to ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent scope, purchased for my little guy's weatherby compact rifle. Definitely a good starter scope however I am a little bias to Leupold and that is the benchmark of what I compare optics to. Overall still pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can spend more and not get better!
customer_reviews.text: I love these scopes, so much there now on every rifle I own from long range RPR in 6.5 Creed to my 223 VTR. Some has replaced Leopold MK4's. Perfect function and clarity. Tracking is spot one and very repeatable. Fast adjusted eye price tunes in perfect clarity. And they look great to boot! But don't forget there no hassle warranty.... should you ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scope! Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scope! Perfect for what I needed. The other reviews as well as internet searching helped me decide on this one. Next time I'm in the market for a new scope I would definitely buy a Vortex scope!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mid price scope with high end glass.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Vortex Diamondback for the low price, quality glass, accurate tracking and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TITUSROCK

customer_reviews.title: easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this scope on an old Korean War era 30-06.
customer_reviews.author: docwiltbank

customer_reviews.title: best scope money can buy
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th one of these. i have put them on everything from .17 HMR, .22 LR to .243 to .308 they are just an all around great scope and you cant beat vortex clarity or warranty. amazon had the best price. will never buy a different brand of optics.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Denton

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality rifle scope. It has lifetime warranty and it is crystal clear. Also, it was at a low price for the quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hunting scope
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing scope. Honestly I beleive looming through it is clearer than looking through it. Couldnt be more impressed with a scope
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: Nice scope for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a scope expert. I'm pleased with this purchase. Scope is nice looking and easy to sight. Adjustments are easy with definitive click for each MOA.. It is clear although focus changes when zooming. I'm not certain if that is normal. I would prefer a bit more eye relief. I'm cautious with 3.1 inches on a .308 recoil. I would recommend and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Williams

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Vortex makes a high quality scope. I put this on my Remington pump 3006. Holds a zero nicely. I have always enjoyed my vortex scopes. In my opinion they are the biggest bank for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: spencenielson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scope for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: So clear. Love the image you get with these scopes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: eLabs

customer_reviews.title: Clear glass for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good scope. For the money it’d be hard to find clear glass like this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael ray bevins

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Solid scope with decent low light capability
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Solid scope with decent low light capability. Worth every bit in my opinion. Has worked well for me as a simple, reliable hunting scope replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Finally went to the range with mine.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered mine, put it on a 17hmr. Went to the range today and shot about 100 rounds through it. Very clear scope. Even on 12x, I was worried by some reviews saying it is foggy on high magnification. It is just as clear or clearer then my Leopold's. Excellent scope.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew s.

customer_reviews.title: Clear, precise, bright, beautiful and easy to use. Great scope!
customer_reviews.text: From a tried and true Nikon guy - this is an outstanding scope! So easy to use; incredibly clear and sharp and I can see better and brighter with it at twilight than with my naked eye. It's like it pulled light from some unknown source to illuminate the game. I got great results and a full freezer to prove it!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Nice little scope for the price, my first one came with issues where the magnification ring locked up, but amazon fixed that, the eye relief is a little crappy, but I can deal.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: This scope is really nice. Go with Vortex because if you break it ...
customer_reviews.text: This scope is really nice. Go with Vortex because if you break it they will fix or replace it...good warranty.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Draeger

customer_reviews.title: Great scope for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This company was great to work with! I had a problem with the lens cover and they got it taken care of. Was able to give my customer the rifle complete. Thank you and I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality scope
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality scope. I have this mounted on my Thompson center venture 300 win mag. Very easy to zero in, holds adjustments well, excellent in low light situations, retical is easy to see and the bdc markings are easy to use. For the money you can't go wrong will definitely be buying for more guns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: Great scope. Well worth the money. Good looking matt finish and very crisp and clear thru the glass. Already took a hog dead on head shot with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Diamondback by Vortex
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this scope for my hunting rifle. The glass is clear and adjustments are solid. Vortex warranty is the best. Received the new scope with a cracked objective eye cover. Sent an email to Vortex and they sent a new scope cover to me in two days. Just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: KMax

customer_reviews.title: A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: One of the clearest scopes I've ever put on a gun
customer_reviews.author: lancer wylie

customer_reviews.title: Works with .22 RWS air gun splendidly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scope to replace the one that came with my RWS 54 .22 air gun. It’s now a tac driver.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my high end air rifle. Very clear and sharp. Excellent value for the price. I would also use it on a .22 rimfire rifle. Looks and feels like a scope at 3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vermeychuk

customer_reviews.title: Great for my ar 15
customer_reviews.text: Bought to place on my AR 15. Does what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: I now have four of these scopes- one of each of my sons' guns and two of mine. You can't beat them for the price and quality. The Vortex warranty is unparalleled.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Vortex diamondback 4-12
customer_reviews.text: Just put on my T/C encore muzzleloader. Scope is excellent so far, hitting gong at 200 yds all day. Seems to gather light well. Pretty good optics, for the price I believe it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Bowtech74

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scope and dead accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scope for my 30-06 and couldnt be happier. My previous scope, much older and cheaper, would change its shot when I zoomed in and out. Not the case with this Vortex! Bright, clear, and accurate! Would buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Holman

customer_reviews.title: Clear!
customer_reviews.text: I do like it but have issues with the Vortex rings. Scope creep. Bought them 6 years ago and just haven't had time to test. So I think I dont have a chance with warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sight picture, high quality. Will buy more from Vortex.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Partial refund
customer_reviews.text: Product was returned brand new. I only revived a fraction of my money back. Higher expectations from an amazon purchase
customer_reviews.author: cooper32

customer_reviews.title: Cracked lens covers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I too received this scope with a cracked lens cover. Doesn’t matter to me because I planned on using Butler Creek lens covers anyways. Everything else is superb quality!
customer_reviews.author: slaten dooley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scope. Loved it so we’ll i bought a second one. Just as good as other high dollar scopes I have.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford L.

customer_reviews.title: One season - no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I like it, great bang for the buck. Nice for 25 yard quick shots out to 200 yards for deer.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Glass
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Vortex purchase. I was looking for an scope for my new 223 Wylde build. I knew I wanted a scope that could perform out to 300+ yrds. This scope performed beyond my expectations. Good clarity, good zoom, great price, and Vortex's warranty, it was a no brainer. With my handloads and experimenting with different powder, this scope enabled me to put 8 shots inside a quarter out of a 10 shot string. I've owned different scopes over the years but, none compare to the quality of this one. The only thing I can note is, there is some blurring at the outer edges at higher magnification. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: DarkSyde

customer_reviews.title: Great scope
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my Ruger #1 45-70 and is great..im not into the bdc reticles, but finding a good scope with traditional crosshairs is becoming more difficult..the bdc on this scope it pretty tolerable since it is pretty low visibility compared to other brands. This is my 2nd vortex scope and love it
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kozak

customer_reviews.title: One of the absolute Best Buy's for the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the absolute Best Buy's for the money. Clarity and function are right up there with much higher priced optics.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Vortex!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the first one, I had to buy another. All of my optics (9) are now Vortex.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lewis

product_meta.title: Vortex Optics Diamondback Second Focal Plane Riflescopes
feature_bullets: The Diamondback 4-12x40 riflescope is one of multiple configurations in the Diamondback lineup and is ideal for big game, predator/varmint, muzzleloader, slug shotgun, and long range applications.
Dead-Hold BDC reticle is good for any hunting or shooting at varying ranges where estimating hold-over would be a concern.
Lenses are fully multi-coated for crystal clear, bright images from dawn till dusk. The fast focus eyepiece allows for quick and easy reticle focusing.
Metal on metal precision turrets offer the ability to zero reset after sight-in. A precision glide erector system ensures accurate tracking and repeatability.

A solid one-piece tube with a hard anodized finish creates a shockproof and durable scope while helping camouflage the shooter's position. Argon purged and o-ring sealed the scope will deliver a lifetime of fog proof and waterproof performance.
